orgContent.html:
youtube-dl -F "url"  // list of options to download
youtube-dl -f <number> "url" // download the video with specific quality
youtube-dl -f best "url" // best
youtube-dl -f 22 "url"   // best
youtube-dl -f 'bestvideo[height<=1080]+bestaudio/best[height<=1080]' <playlist link>
youtube-dl -o "[%(upload_date)s] %(title)s.%(ext)s" -f 'bestvideo[height<=1080]+bestaudio/best[height<=1080]'  <playlist link>
youtube-dl --write-auto-sub -f 'bestvideo[height<=1080]+bestaudio/best[height<=1080]'  <playlist link>  // with automatic subtitle
youtube-dl --write-sub -f 'bestvideo[height<=1080]+bestaudio/best[height<=1080]' <playlist link> // with the creator subtitle
